Hi Karlo,

I hope all is well.

Sure, for reference, I have attached a screenshot of where to change the settings.
You will see the "Apply Type" and you need to apply it on all filter widget.

Hi Joel

Can I also request the following pages to have the same filter settings that create unique URLs similar to what you did for https://www.msaustralia.org.au/projects

https://www.msaustralia.org.au/advocacy/submissions/
https://www.msaustralia.org.au/clinics/

Where do you see the settings for this? I tried to go into smart filters settings but could not figure it out.

Thanks
Karlo

Hi Karlo,

I hope all is well.

Sure, we have adjusted the filter settings. can you try now?

Hi Joel/Rica

Is there a way to have a URL for active filters?

For example on this page: https://www.msaustralia.org.au/projects/

I would like to be able to send someone a URL with the pre-selected filters. Is this possible?

Thanks
Karlo
